data.title: BE20 210 Swing Gate
data.desc: The entry model Brushless twin gate kit is suitable for gates up to 2.2m per wing which is perfect for most garden gates.

data.title: BH30 803 Sliding Gate Motor
data.desc: The Roger Brushless 1000kg BH30 803 sliding gate motor being demonstrating its smooth travel in the Roger Technology test lab.

data.title: BR20 500 Twin Swing Gate
data.desc: Roger Brushless high speed BR20/500 twin gate kit perfect for twin or single palisade gates.
data.doc: Roger Brushless BR20 500 Twin Swing Gate

data.title: BR21 362 Single Underground Gate Motor
data.desc: A Brushless BR21/362 underground single gate kit comfortably operating a 4.5m wooden gate.

data.title: BR21 362 Twin Underground Gate Motor Wooden Gates
data.desc: The underground Brushless BR21/362 twin kit installed & working perfectly on a fully boarded wooden gate.
data.doc: Roger Brushless Br21 362 Twin Underground Gate Motor 2

data.title: G30 2204 Sliding Gate Motor
data.desc: Roger Brushless BR21/362 underground gate kit for gates up to 4m per wing, 36v super intensive use, with digital encoder.

data.title: Smarty 5 36v Single Gate Kit
data.desc: The Roger Brushless SMARTY 5 above ground kit capable of opening a 5m gate leaf, super intensive use, with digital encoder.

data.title: Agilik Barrier Twin
data.desc: The Brushless Agilik barrier comes in lengths of 4m or 6m and is perfect for car parks thanks to its super intensive use motor with a very low power consumption.

data.title: Floor Lock and Maglock
data.desc: The full magnetic lock kit including floor locking for twin electric gates can be used with either wooden or metal gates. It is the best locking solution available.

data.title: Single gate safety guidance
data.desc: A safety guidance video created by The Electric Gate Shop illustrating the key safety points of single gate automation.

data.title: Twin safety
data.desc: A safety guidance video created by The Electric Gate Shop displaying a practical explanation of the important safety points of twin gate automation.

data.title: Underground gate safety
data.desc: A safety guidance video created by The Electric Gate Shop outlining the critical safety points of underground gate automation.

data.title: Sliding gate safety
data.desc: A safety guidance video created by The Electric Gate Shop demonstrating the important safety points of sliding gate automation.

data.title: Rising Wheel Stop
data.desc: The rising wheel stop is designed for gates on a driveway with a gradient, it allows a stop at the bottom of the gate when there is a gap between the bottom of the gate and the floor.

data.title: Sub 180 Underground Gate Automation
data.desc: Underground automation system, perfect for farm gates whilst underground out of sight. This kit does not need the usual 65mm hinge centre as required on standard gate motors

data.title: Roger Technology Brushless BH30 500 High Speed
data.desc: The High Speed motor range is one of the latest innovations from Roger Technology and is the perfect solution should you need a safe high speed gate motor.

data.title: Easy Quote
data.desc: Our Easy Quote feature is the easiest & fastest way to receive a complete quotation for your electric gates.

data.title: Roger Agilik Board Anti Crushing
data.desc: A demonstration of the fantastic anti-crush system on-board the Brushless barriers which comes as standard on all Brushless gate and barrier kits.

data.title: Roger Brushless Agilik Barrier LED Strip
data.desc: The Agilik barrier from Roger Technology includes a LED strip along the boom to increase visibility in dark environments.
